EKF SC9-TOCCATA

See Product Page for the board’s technical specifications.

Inventory (Object: inventory)

The inventory function provides access to the inventory, such as the vendor, model, serial number (taken from the board’s EEPROM), and revision (from SMBIOS sysfs entry).

Method

Description

Example Value

vendor()

Get the board vendor

EKF

model()

Get the board model

SC9-TOCCATA

serial()

Get the board serial number

12345678

repaired_at()

Board repair date

repaired_at()

Board manufacturing date

revision()

Get the board revision

1

CPU Temperature (Object: cputemp)

The CPU temperature object provides the current CPU Die temperature in degrees Celsius.

Method

Description

Example Value

cputemp()

Get the CPU temp

65
